snippet: New York State lawmakers approved a measure that could lead to the dissolution of the binational agency that runs a crossing between Buffalo and Fort Erie, Ontario.
abstract: New York State lawmakers approve measure that could lead to dissolution of binational agency that runs bridge linking Buffalo and Fort Erie, Ontario; structure, called Peace Bridge, crosses Niagara River and is focus of continuing dispute between Gov Andrew M Cuomo administration and Canadian officials.
lead_paragraph: New York State lawmakers approved a measure that could lead to the dissolution of the binational agency that runs a crossing between Buffalo and Fort Erie, Ontario.

headline.main: Peace Bridge Authority Given Deadline by Legislature
headline.print_headline: Legislature Approves Bill That May End Bridge Agency

keywords.value: Buffalo and Fort Erie Public Bridge Authority
keywords.name: organizations
